## Getting to Know NV

Hello! I'm Nykko Vitali, but you can call me **NV**. This space is where I share a bit about who I am beyond the professional facade.

### My Philosophy

The quote that resonates deeply with me is from Alfred Korzybski: *"Anything you know about cannot be you."* This profound statement reminds me that we are always more than our definitions, categories, and labels. We exist beyond the boxes others (and we ourselves) try to put us in.

### What Drives Me

- **Continuous Learning**: I believe that growth happens when we step outside our comfort zones
- **Authentic Connections**: Real relationships are built on genuine understanding and mutual respect
- **Purpose-Driven Work**: Everything I do is guided by a desire to make a meaningful impact

### Beyond the Professional

When I'm not working, you might find me:

- Exploring new ideas through books and conversations
- Seeking out experiences that challenge my perspectives  
- Building connections with interesting people from all walks of life
- Contemplating the mysteries of existence (yes, I'm that person!)

### Let's Connect

I'm always interested in meeting new people and having meaningful conversations. Whether you want to discuss philosophy, share an interesting idea, or just say hello, I'd love to hear from you.

You can reach me on [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/nykko-vitali-0a4826158/) or through any of the other channels listed on this site.
